name: 討論與辯論（一）
description: 本課旨在訓練培養學生參與英語討論及辯論的口語能力。在辯論部分，學生將學習基本批判思考、論點陳述、相互提問與反駁回應技巧，並熟悉相關言談特色。課程進行方式主要為全班或小組討論與簡易論辯練習為主。在討論部分，學生將藉由討論方式，探討不同國內外議題，並嘗試參與不同類型之小組討論。學習評量包含學生個人及所屬小組之課堂表現及課前準備，同組組員亦將彼此互評各組員之貢獻。
goals: Acquire the knowledge of different debate propositions and the ability to word a debate proposition properly.

syllabus:
**Course Description:**

This course will introduce students to the basic principles of debates, focusing on critical thinking skills, argument development, and oral presentation strategies. Students will research topics related to campus life, higher education, and contemporary public policies, and then participate in debates on those issues with both individual and collaborative efforts.

The course aims to provide a learning environment for students not only to improve their argument development skills but also to sharpen their sensibilities toward what is happening on campus, in our society, and in the world.
